description: System-generated unique identifier for the repair grouping record; used as the primary key and to link related maintenance data.
Short internal code that identifies the repair grouping within the maintenance classification scheme used across work orders and reporting.
Human-readable name or description of the repair grouping for display on service documents, work orders, and reports.
Flag indicating the grouping is retired and should no longer be assigned to new maintenance records; retained only for historical reporting.
Reference to the parent repair category to which this grouping belongs; links to a category master for hierarchy and roll-up reporting.
Indicates this grouping is the default selection, likely used when auto-assigning groups within a category or creating new records; confirm with SME.
